Transfer Stations 0.1

(Comments welcome!)

Facilities which accept bulk waste and recyclables.

→ Find datasets tagged [transfer-stations] on data.gov.au

General recommendations:

  Recommendation
Format Point data. CSV (preferred), GeoJSON
Dataset name [Council name] Transfer Stations
data.gov.au tag transfer-stations, ocd-transfer-stations, ocd-transfer-stations-0.1

Required fields

Field Description
lat, lon Latitude, longitude, decimal degrees. (EPSG:4326)
name Name of the station

Recommended fields

Field Description
operator The council (or company) that operates the station.
contact_ph The station's telephone number.
info_url A URL with more information about the station.

Optional fields

Field Description
mon_hours_start, mon_hours_end Monday opening hours
tue_hours_start, tue_hours_end As for monday hours
wed_hours_start, wed_hours_end As for monday hours
thu_hours_start, thu_hours_end As for monday hours
fri_hours_start, fri_hours_end As for monday hours
sat_hours_start, sat_hours_end As for monday hours
sun_hours_start, sun_hours_end As for monday hours
